name: KumaParadise
body:
### Welcome to KumaParadise
KumaParadise was founded on the belief that design is not art, but a fundamental utility for communication and persuasion. While it may not be sweet and fluffy, it's the strong foundation necessary for building something meaningful.

We combine our client's passion and talent with our ability to distill their mission, personality and vision into functional and creative solutions.

As a trendy and genius people, we have proven that clients who value this approach are rewarded with effective communication tools and measurable outcomes.

### Support or Contact
Do you want to contact us? Please email us kuma@live.jp
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
